Package com.i2group.apollo.alertretrievalservice.transport

Contains classes for the service that retrieves alerts about items in the Analysis Repository.

See:
          Description

Class Summary
Alert An alert, as generated by an alert feed in response to a change to an item in the Analysis Repository.
AlertResults Contains the Alerts and Items that form the results of a request to retrieve alerts.
AlertRetrievalToken A server-generated token that represents a high-water mark for the Alerts retrieved from a particular set of alert feeds.
ItemChangedAlert An Alert caused by a change to an Item in the Analysis Repository.
LinkCreatedAlert An Alert caused by the creation of a Link in the Analysis Repository.
RepositoryAlert A generic representation for an Alert that is generated in response to a change in the Analysis Repository.
SetAmendedAlert An Alert caused by Items being either added to or removed from a set in the Analysis Repository.
 

Package com.i2group.apollo.alertretrievalservice.transport Description

Contains classes for the service that retrieves alerts about items in the Analysis Repository.

Since:
3.0
